ygData.subject: DNS is limited when add QuotaEnforcer
ygData.msgSnippet: I add org.archive.crawler.prefetch.QuotaEnforcer for limit a number of download web pages per host, but I found some problem that the DNS doesn t resolve

load web pages per host, but I found some problem that the DNS doesn't reso=
lve hostname when a number of downloaded dns > QuotaEnforcer (I assiged 100=
